name: SafeZoneVR
description:
SafeZoneVR is a interactive survival psychological horror game, you will scavenge the map trying to escape a fallen SafeZone in Melbourne Alabama. A SafeZone once strong and bustling as the survivors flocked to it. After unknown events It is now deserted and you are the only person alive for as far as you can think. Escape, scavenge, survive, all while battling your own psychological warfare as the darkness floods over you. You will have to flee to the metro and the labs below the city, hide from the unknown apocalyptic killer and with the help of your radio friend make it out alive.

This game was created by a High School student developer over the course of 3 years. Launch day will only include Oculus Headset for support but valve index and htc controller support will be coming soon. Sorry for the late notice!
